bio.Occupation: Second in Command, Overwatch (formerly), Bounty Hunter

Secondary fire: Scoped Mode.description: Anas rifle shoots darts that can restore health to her allies or deal ongoing damage to her enemies. She can use the rifles scope to zoom in on targets and make highly accurate shots.

Sleep Dart.description: Ana fires a dart from her sidearm, rendering an enemy unconscious (though any damage will rouse them).

Biotic Grenade.Healing: 100 healing to allies; 100 healing on self
Biotic Grenade.Healing Buff: +50% healing to allies, or block healing to enemies;+50% healing on self
Biotic Grenade.description: Ana tosses a biotic bomb that deals damage to enemies and heals allies in a small area of effect. Affected allies briefly receive increased healing from all sources, while enemies caught in the blast cannot be healed for a few moments.

Nano Boost\u00a0(Ultimate).description: After Ana hits one of her allies with a combat boost, they temporarily move faster, deal more damage, and take less damage from enemies attacks.

Exo Boots (Passive).description: Once crouch is released, jump remain charged for 1 second. Resets if crouch is pressedBy first crouching, Baptiste can jump higher.

Biotic Launcher (Primary) (Hitscan).Rate of fire: 3 rounds per second then .35 second cooldown
Biotic Launcher (Primary) (Hitscan).description: Baptistes three-round-burst Biotic Launcher rewards accuracy and recoil control with significant damage output.

Biotic Launcher (Secondary) (Projectile).description: Will pass through teammates with full healthIt also doubles as a healing device, lobbing projectiles that heal allies near the point of impact.

Regenerative Burst.description: Heal applies once to allies within 3 meters. They receive 5 full seconds of healing.Baptiste activates an intense regenerative burst that heals himself and nearby allies over time.

Immortality Field.Duration: 8 seconds (field persist .5 seconds longer than generator)
Immortality Field.description: Generator bounces off environmentBaptiste uses a device to create a field that prevents allies from dying. The generator can be destroyed.

Amplification Matrix (Ultimate).description: Can change direction by pressing ult key againBaptiste creates a matrix that doubles the damage and healing effects of friendly projectiles that pass through it.

Configuration:\u00a0Recon.description: In Recon mode, Bastion is fully mobile, outfitted with a submachine gun that fires steady bursts of bullets at medium range.

Configuration:\u00a0Sentry.description: In Sentry mode, Bastion is a stationary powerhouse equipped with a gatling gun capable of unleashing a hail of bullets. The guns aim can be walked across multiple targets, dealing devastating damage at short to medium range.

Self-Repair.description: In Sentry mode, Bastion is a stationary powerhouse equipped with a gatling gun capable of unleashing a hail of bullets. The guns aim can be walked across multiple targets, dealing devastating damage at short to medium range.

Reconfigure.description: Press to switch between weapon configurations.

Configuration: Tank (Ultimate Ability).description: In Tank mode, Bastion extends wheeled treads and a powerful long-range cannon. The cannons explosive shells demolish targets in a wide blast radius, but Bastion can only remain in this mode for a limited time.

bio.Affiliation: Mobile Exo-Force of the Korean Army

Eject (Passive).description: D.Va ejects out of her mech when it is destroyed.

Fusion Cannons (Mech).Ammo: rounds per clip;11 pellets per shot
Fusion Cannons (Mech).Damage: 0.6  2 damage per pellet; Max 22 bodyshot damage
Fusion Cannons (Mech).description: D.Vas mech is equipped with twin short-range rotating cannons. They lay down continuous, high-damage fire without needing to reload, but slow D.Vas movement while theyre active.

Defense Matrix.Duration: Lasts 2 seconds or until turned off
Defense Matrix.description: D.Va can activate this forward-facing targeting array to shoot incoming projectiles out of the air.

Boosters.description: D.Vas mech launches into the air, her momentum carrying her forward. She can turn and change directions or barrel through her enemies, knocking them back.

Micro Missiles.description: D.Vas mech launches into the air, her momentum carrying her forward. She can turn and change directions or barrel through her enemies, knocking them back.

Self-Destruct (Mech Ultimate).Damage: 1000 from point of explosion (falls off with distance)
Self-Destruct (Mech Ultimate).description: D.Va ejects from her mech and sets its reactor to explode, dealing massive damage to nearby opponents.

Light Gun (Pilot).description: While outside of her mech, D.Va can continue the fight with a mid-range automatic blaster.

Call Mech (Pilot Ultimate).description: If her armored battle suit is destroyed, D.Va can call down a fresh mech and return to the fray.

The Best Defense\u2026 (Passive).Buff: +30 or +75 temporary shield per enemy damaged
The Best Defense\u2026 (Passive).Decay: 3 HP per sec decay;1.5 sec decay buffer
The Best Defense\u2026 (Passive).description: Doomfist generates temporary personal shields when he deals ability damage.

Hand Cannon.Reload: 0.75 second reload per round; Max 3-second reload
Hand Cannon.Damage: 11 damage per pellet; 6pellets per shot;Max 66 bodyshot damage
Hand Cannon.description: Doomfist fires a short-range burst from the knuckles of his fist. Its ammunition is automatically regenerated over a short time.

Rocket Punch.Damage: 49  100 damage; Max 98  250 damage if a wall is hit
Rocket Punch.description: After charging up, Doomfist lunges forward and knocks an enemy back, dealing additional damage if they impact a wall.

Rising Uppercut.description: Doomfist uppercuts enemies in front of him into the air.

Seismic Slam.description: Doomfist leaps forward and smashes into the ground, knocking nearby enemies toward him.

Meteor Strike (Ultimate Ability).description: Doomfist leaps into the sky, then crashes to the ground, dealing significant damage.

Cyber-Agility (Passive).description: Thanks to his cyberneticabilities, Genji can climb walls and perform jumps in mid-air.

Shuriken.Fire Rate: 1 burst per second;3 rounds per burst
Shuriken.description: Genji looses three deadly throwing stars in quick succession.

Fan of Blades.Fire Rate: 1.33 shot per second; 3 rounds per shot
Fan of Blades.description: Alternatively, he can throw three shuriken in a wider spread.

Swift Strike.description: Genji darts forward, slashing with his katana and passing through foes in his path. If Genji eliminates a target, he can instantly use this ability again.

Deflect.description: With lightning-quick swipes of his sword, Genji reflects an oncoming projectile and sends it rebounding towards his opponent.

Dragonblade (Ultimate).description: Genji brandishes his katana for a brief period of time. Until he sheathes his sword, Genji can deliver killing strikes to any targets within his reach.

Wall Climb (Passive).description: Jump at walls to climb at them.

Storm Bow.Cast duration: 0.75 seconds to fully charge arrow, 0.5 seconds buffer
Storm Bow.description: Hanzo nocks and fires an arrow at his target.

Sonic Arrow.description: Hanzo launches an arrow that contains a sonar tracking device. Any enemy within its detection radius is visibly marked, making them easier for Hanzo and his allies to hunt down.

Scatter Arrow.Damage: 29  125 for the initial shot, 22  75 per fragment
Scatter Arrow.description: Hanzo shoots a fragmenting arrow that ricochets off walls and objects and can strike multiple targets at once.

Dragonstrike.description: Hanzo summons a Spirit Dragon which travels through the air in a line. It passes through walls in its way, devouring any enemies it encounters.

Total Mayhem (Passive).description: Junkrats deranged sense of humor persists past his death. If killed, he drops several live grenades.

Frag Launcher.description: Junkrats Frag Launcher lobs grenades a significant distance. They bounce to reach their destination, and blow up when they strike an enemy.

Concussion Mine.description: After placing one of his homemade Concussion Mines, Junkrat can trigger it to damage enemies and send them flying or propel himself through the air.

Steel Trap.description: Junkrat tosses out a giant, metal-toothed trap. Should an enemy wander too close to the trap, it clamps on, injuring and immobilizing them.

Rip-Tire (Ultimate).description: Junkrat revs up a motorized tire bomb and sends it rolling across the battlefield, climbing over walls and obstacles. He can remotely detonate the RIP-Tire to deal serious damage to enemies caught in the blast, or just wait for it to explode on its own.

Wall Ride (Passive).description: Jump onto a wall to ride along it.

Sonic Amplifier.Fire Rate: 1 burst per second; 4 rounds per burst
Sonic Amplifier.description: Lcio can hit his enemies with sonic projectiles or knock them back with a blast of sound.

Soundwave (Alternate fire).Ammo: 20 rounds per clip (4 rounds per shot)
Soundwave (Alternate fire).description: Knock enemies back with a blast of sound.

Crossfade.Lcio continuously energizes himselfand n: one amplifies movement speed, while the other regenerates health.

Amp It Up.description: Lcio increases the volume on his speakers, boosting the effects of his songs.

Sound Barrier (Ultimate).description: Protective waves radiate out from Lcios Sonic Amplifier, briefly providing him and nearby allies with personal shields.

Peacekeeper (Single Shot).description: McCree fires off a round from his trusty six-shooter.

Peacekeeper (Fan the Hammer).Fire Rate: 1 bullet in 0.11 second to 6 bullets in 0.67 second
Peacekeeper (Fan the Hammer).description: McCreecan fan the Peacekeepers hammer to swiftly unload the entire cylinder.

Combat Roll.description: McCree dives in the direction hes moving, effortlessly reloading his Peacekeeper in the process.

Flashbang.description: McCree heaves a blinding grenade that explodes shortly after it leaves his hand. The blast staggers enemies in a small radius.

Deadeye (Ultimate).description: Focus. Mark. Draw. McCree takes a few precious moments to aim; when hes ready to fire, he shoots every enemy in his line of sight. The weaker his targets are, the faster hell line up a killshot.

Endothermic Blaster: Freeze Spray.description: Meis blaster unleashes a concentrated, short-range stream of frost that damages, slows, and ultimately freezes enemies in place.

Endothermic Blaster: Icicle (Alternate F.description: Mei can also use her blaster to shoot icicle-like projectiles at medium range.

Cryo-Freeze.HOTKEY: LEFTSHIFT  or and again to cancel
Cryo-Freeze.description: Mei instantly surrounds herself with a block of thick ice. She heals and ignores damage while encased, but cannot move or use abilities.

Ice Wall.HOTKEY: E  or and again to rotate 90
Ice Wall.description: Mei generates an enormous ice wall that obstructs lines of sight, stops movement, and blocks attacks.

Blizzard (Ultimate).description: Mei deploys a weather-modification drone that emits gusts of wind and snow in a wide area. Enemies caught in the blizzard are slowed and take damage; those who linger too long are frozen solid.

Angelic Descent (Passive).Ability: Hold down the jump button to slow descent in the air
Angelic Descent (Passive).description: Propelled by her Valkyrie suit, Mercy slows the speed of her descent from great heights.

Caduceus Staff.Duration: Until manually disconnected, or 2 seconds after blocked
Caduceus Staff.description: Mercy engages one of two beams that connect to an ally. By maintaining the beams, she can either restore that allys health or increase the amount of damage they deal.

Caduceus Blaster.description: Mercy shoots a round from her sidearm. Its best reserved for emergency personal defense.

Guardian Angel.description: Mercy flies towards a targeted ally, allowing her to reach them quickly and provide assistance in crucial moments.

Resurrect.description: Mercy radiates restorative power, bringing nearby dead allies back into the fight with full health.

Valkyrie (Ultimate Ability).description: Valkyrie unleashes the full power of Mercys Valkyrie Suit, enhancing her weapons and abilities for 20 seconds.

Secondary fire: Decay.description: Using her left hand, Moira expends biotic energy to heal allies in front of her. Her right hand fires a long-range beam weapon that saps enemies health, healing Moira and replenishing her biotic energy.

Fade.description: Disappear, move faster, and become invulnerable, but you cannot shoot.

Biotic Orb.description: Moira launches a rebounding biotic sphere; she can choose between a regeneration effect that heals the allies it passes through, or a decay effect that deals damage to enemies.

Coalescence (Ultimate Ability).description: Moira channels a long-range beam that both heals allies and bypasses barriers to damage her enemies. While channeling this ability, Moiras movement speed increases greatly, but she cannot perform any other actions.

Fusion Driver.description: Orisas automatic projectile cannon delivers sustained damage, but slows her movement while she fires it.

Halt!.description: Orisa launches a graviton charge which she can detonate, slowing nearby enemies and pulling them towards the explosion.

Fortify.description: Orisa temporarily reduces damage she takes, and cannot be affected by action-impairing effects.

Protective Barrier.description: Orisa throws out a stationary barrier that can protect her and her allies from enemy fire.

Supercharger (Ultimate Ability).description: Orisa deploys a device to increase damage by 50% inflicted by allies within its line of sight.

Rocket Launcher.Damage: 120 direct hit;20  80 splash damage;10  40 splash self damage
Rocket Launcher.description: Pharahs primary weapon launches rockets that deal significant damage in a wide blast radius.

Concussive Blast.description: Pharah looses a wrist rocket that knocks back any enemies it strikes.

Jump Jet.description: Propelled by her suits thrusters, Pharah soars high into the air.

Barrage (Ultimate Ability).description: Pharah directs a continuous salvo of mini-rockets to destroy groups of enemies.

The Reaping (Passive).description: Reaper steals health from his enemies as he damages them.
The Reaping (Passive).Effect: 20% of damage done restored as HP

Hellfire Shotguns.description: Reaper can collect Soul Globes to regain health.

Wraith Form.description: Reaper becomes a shadow for a short period of time. While in this form, he takes no damage and is able to pass through enemies, but cannot fire his weapons or use other abilities.

Shadow Step.description: After marking a destination, Reaper disappears and reappears at that location.

Death Blossom (Ultimate).description: In a blur of motion, Reaper empties both Hellfire Shotguns at breakneck speed, dealing massive damage to all nearby enemies.

Rocket Hammer.description: Reinhardts Rocket Hammer is an exemplary melee weapon, able to deal punishing damage in a wide arc with every swing.

Barrier Field.description: Reinhardt projects a broad, forward-facing energy barrier, which can absorb substantial damage before it is destroyed. Though Reinhardt can protect himself and his companions behind the barrier, he cannot attack while sustaining it.

Charge.description: Reinhardt charges forth in a straight line, pinning the first enemy in his path and knocking others aside. If he collides with a wall, the foe hes carrying suffers extreme damage.

Fire Strike.description: By whipping his Rocket Hammer forward, Reinhardt slings a flaming projectile which pierces and damages any enemies it touches.

Earthshatter (Ultimate).description: Reinhardt forcefully slams his Rocket Hammer into the ground, knocking down and damaging all enemies in front of him.

Scrap Gun Blast.description: Roadhogs Scrap Gun fires short-range blasts of shrapnel with a wide spread.

Shrapnel\u00a0Ball (Alternate Fire).description: Alternatively, it can launch a shrapnel ball that detonates farther away, scattering metal fragments from the point of impact.

Chain Hook.description: Roadhog hurls his chain at a target; if it catches, he yanks them into close range.

Take A Breather.description: Roadhog restores a chunk of his health over a brief period of time.

Whole Hog\u00a0(Ultimate).description: After cramming a top-loader onto his Scrap Gun, Roadhog pours in ammo. For a short time, he can crank out a stream of shrapnel that knocks back enemies.

Heavy Pulse Rifle.Soldier: 76s rifle remains particularly steady while unloading fully-automatic pulse fire.

Helix Rockets.Tiny rockets spiral out of Soldier: 76s Pulse Rifle in a single burst. The rockets explosion damages enemies in a small radius.

Sprint.Whether he needs to evade a firefight or: 76 can rush ahead in a burst of speed. His sprint ends if he takes an action other than charging forward.

Biotic Field.Soldier: 76 plants a biotic emitter on the ground. Its energy projection restores health to 76 and any of his squadmates within the field.

Tactical Visor (Ultimate Ability).Soldier: 76s pinpoint targeting visor locks his aim on the threat closest to his crosshairs. If an enemy leaves his line of sight, Soldier

Opportunist (Passive).description: Sombra detects critically injured enemies through walls. This effect becomes active on an enemy if they fall below half health.

Machine Pistol.description: Sombras fully-automatic machine pistol fires in a short-range spread.

Hack.description: Sombra hacks enemies to temporarily stop them from using their abilities, or hacks first aid kits to spawn faster and make them useless to her opponents. Taking damage interrupts the hacking.

Stealth.description: Sombra becomes invisible for a short period of time, during which her speed is boosted considerably. Attacking, using offensive abilities, or taking damage disables her camouflage.

Translocator.description: Sombra tosses out a translocator beacon. She can instantly return to the beacons location while it is active you can only have one beacon at a time. (including when its in mid-flight).

EMP (Ultimate Ability).description: Sombra discharges electromagnetic energy in a wide radius, destroying enemy barriers and shields and hacking all opponents caught in the blast.

Photon Beam.description: Symmetras weapon emits a short-range beam that homes in on a nearby enemy, dealing continuous damage that increases the longer it is connected.

Energy Ball (Alternate Fire).description: The projector can also release a charged energy ball that deals high damage.

Sentry Turret.description: Symmetra sets up a small turret that automatically fires speed-reducing blasts at the nearest enemy within range. Several turrets can be built on the battlefield at once.

Photon Barrier.description: Symmetra projects a moving barrier that absorbs damage as it travels forward.

Teleporter (Ultimate).Duration: Lasts until destroyed or depleted of charges
Teleporter (Ultimate).description: Symmetra places a teleporter exit pad at her current location, and connects it to a teleporter entry pad at her teams starting point. Allies can travel through the entry pad to the exit pad instantly, enabling them to return to the fight swiftly after being defeated.

Shield Generator (Ultimate).description: Symmetra deploys a wide-radius generator that provides increased shielding to her entire team.

Scrap Collector (Passive).description: Torbjrn can collect scrap from enemies or allies that die on the battlefield.
Scrap Collector (Passive).Ability: +2 scrap per second, +15 scrap per pickup; Max 200 scrap

Rivet Gun Shot.description: Torbjrn fires rivets at long range

Rivet Gun Burst (Alternate Fire).description: Torbjrn ejects molten metal from his gun in a short, close-range burst.

Forge Hammer (Alternate Weapon).description: Torbjrn uses his multipurpose hammer to build, upgrade and repair turrets. In a pinch, it can also be swung as a weapon.

Build Turret.Turret Fire Rate: 2, 4, 5 rounds per second; 4 rockets per second
Build Turret.description: Torbjrn constructs an enemy-tracking autocannon. He can use his Forge Hammer to repair or upgrade it, increasing its health and adding a second cannon barrel and a rocket launcher.

Armor Pack.description: Torbjrn deploys an armor upgrade; either he or his allies can pick it up to absorb some damage.

Molten Core (Ultimate).description: After overheating his personal forge, Torbjrn gains a significant amount of armor and scrap. He also attacks (and builds and repairs turrets) far faster than normal.

Pulse Pistols.description: Tracer rapid-fires both of her pistols.

Blink.description: Tracer zips horizontally through space in the direction shes moving, and reappears several yards away. She stores up to three charges of the blink ability and generates more every few seconds.

Recall.Ability: Returnsyou to position from 3 seconds ago
Recall.description: Tracer bounds backward in time, returning her health, ammo and position on the map to precisely where they were a few seconds before.

Pulse Bomb (Ultimate).description: Tracer lobs a large bomb that adheres to any surface or unfortunate opponent it lands on. After a brief delay, the bomb explodes, dealing high damage to all enemies within its blast radius.

Widow\u2019s Kiss (Automatic).description: Widowmakers rifle can be shot in fully-automatic mode allowing her to effectively shoot targets from close to medium range.

Widow\u2019s Kiss (Scoped, Alternate fir.Fire Rate: 1 uncharged shot per 0.45 seconds  1 fully charged shot per 1.2 seconds
Widow\u2019s Kiss (Scoped, Alternate fir.description: Widowmakers versatile sniper rifle is ideal for scope-aimed shots at distant targets.
Widow\u2019s Kiss (Scoped, Alternate fir.Charge Time: 0.75 second charging, 0.45 second buffer, 0.33 second scope in/out

Grappling Hook.description: Widowmaker launches a grappling hook towards the location shes aiming at  when the hook connects with a scalable surface, shes quickly drawn towards it, allowing her to expand her view of the battlefield and evade or flank targets.

Venom Mine.description: Widowmaker adheres a swiftly-arming venom mine to nearly any surface. When a target wanders within range of the mines motion trigger, it explodes, delivering poison gas to any enemies in the vicinity.

Infra-Sight (Ultimate).description: Widowmakers recon visor allows her to see the heat signatures of her targets through walls and objects for a moderate amount of time. This enhanced vision is shared with her allies.

Tesla Cannon.description: Winstons weapon fires a short-range electric barrage for as long as he holds down the trigger.

Jump Pack.description: Assisted by his energy pack, Winston lunges through the air, dealing significant damage and staggering nearby enemies when he lands.

Barrier Projector.description: Winstons barrier projector extends a bubble-shaped field that absorbs damage until its destroyed. Allies protected by the barrier can return fire from within it.

Primal Rage (Ultimate).Health Buff: +500 maximum health; health and armor fully replenished
Primal Rage (Ultimate).description: Winston embraces his animal nature, significantly boosting his health and making him very difficult to kill, strengthening his melee attack, and allowing him to use his Jump Pack ability more frequently. While raging, Winston can only make melee and Jump Pack attacks.

Energy (Passive).Particle Cannon Damage: +1% per point; Max +100% Particle Cannon damage
Energy (Passive).description: Damage blocked increases Particle Cannon damage.

Particle Energy Beam.description: Zaryas mighty Particle Cannon unleashes a short-range beam of destructive energy.

Particle Explosive Charge (Alternate fir.description: Alternatively, Zarya can lob an explosive charge to strike multiple opponents.

Particle Barrier.description: The Particle Cannon can emit a personal barrier that shields Zarya against incoming attacks, redirecting their energy to enhance her weapons damage and the width of its beam.

Projected Barrier.description: Zarya surrounds one of her teammates with an energy barrier that simultaneously absorbs fire and boosts the power of her Particle Cannon.

Graviton Surge (Ultimate).description: Zarya launches a gravity bomb that draws in enemy combatants and deals damage while theyre trapped.

Orb of Destruction (Singular Orb).description: Zenyatta projects his destructive energy orbs individually.

Orb of Destruction (Orb Volley).description: Zenyatta projects his destructive energy orbs in a rapid-fire volley after a few seconds spent gathering power.

Orb of Harmony.Duration: 3 seconds or until target is changed
Orb of Harmony.description: Zenyatta casts an orb over the shoulder of a targeted ally. So long as Zenyatta maintains line of sight, the orb slowly restores health to his ally. Only one ally can receive the orbs benefit at a time.

Orb of Discord.Duration: 3 seconds or until target is changed
Orb of Discord.description: Attaching the orb of discord to an opponent amplifies the amount of damage they receive for as long as Zenyatta maintains line of sight. Only one opponent can suffer the orbs effects at a time.

Transcendence (Ultimate).description: Zenyatta enters a state of heightened existence for a short period of time. While transcendent, Zenyatta cannot use abilities or weapons, but is immune to damage and automatically restores his health and that of nearby allies.
